alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 08 at 9:49AM CST until February 09 at 6:20PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Alabama River Near Millers Ferry Dam affecting Wilcox, Monroe and Dallas Counties. For the Alabama River...including Millers Ferry Dam, Claiborne Dam... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Alabama River Near Millers Ferry Dam. * WHEN...Until Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 66 feet, Farm and pasturelands in the area will flood and cattle should be moved to higher ground. At 68 feet, Millers Ferry Park begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 69.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 69.6 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 66 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
